name: Hero (Age of Empires)
description: Heroes are special units in Age of Empires. Unavailable in regular games, they typically refer to historical or mythological figures found in lore of ancient civilizations. As such, they are often featured in campaign scenarios.

Villagers have +15 hit points.

name: Cheat unit
description: A cheat unit is a unit that can only be obtained through typing a cheat code in the in-game chat bar. Note that, in most of the games, the cheat codes are not case sensitive. Every game in the Age of Empires series has cheat units. However, since Age of Empires III, some cheat units are available in the Scenario Editor, providing an alternative way of obtaining cheat units aside from typing their respective cheat codes.

Must-survive unit in Regicide games. Game asks for confirmation when trying to delete.




The King is a special untrainable unit introduced in update 141935 of Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Return of Rome, appearing in Regicide games. They cannot do any task, but can be used to scout in the early game when the threat of being attacked is low. In Regicide games, players that lose their King instantly lose the game.
